thread.section_title: Pratic Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Location, location, location
thread.title_full: Location, location, location - Review of Pratic Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: FruFroh
title: Location, location, location
text:
This hotel has a PERFECT location, situated on a small square in the heart of Marais, surrounded by plenty of cosy caf√©s and wonderful, quirky shops.
The hotel itself is very small and the room (standard double) was TINY! We could barely get around the bed (see photo), and our first room didn't even have a door to the toilet, just a shower curtain... However, the staff was nice enough to change our room. The new room was just as small, but at least it had a toilet door ;-) The rooms were clean, looked newly renovated, and the bed was comfortable.
All staff members were English-speaking, very friendly and service-minded.
